pages.text: Strange demons that are more spiritual than physical in nature, and are said to feed off the fear and negative emotions of a person. As their name suggests, Shadow People are usually reminiscent of a personâ€™s shadow, but often with slightly too long arms and legs, and with empty eyes that glow like embers.
Unlike normal demons, Shadow People usually cannot be conjured at will, and only appear as a side effect from certain rites.
